author: Harry Craddock
description: A trio of spirits tamed by a splash of aromatised wine. Temperature of serve is key so be sure to chill your glass and ideally your ingredients well. Although not classic, I like to serve with an orange zest twist.
name: Wow
recipeIngredient: 22.5 ml White (charcoal-filtered) 1-4 year old light rum

recipeInstructions.text: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass
